mapper.sql: COURSE_FLOW, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_IMG_URL, DETAIL_IMG_URL, TEACHER_NAME, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.STUDY_COURSE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.STUDY_COURSE (COURSE_FLOW, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_IMG_URL, DETAIL_IMG_URL, TEACHER_NAME, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{courseFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

COURSE_FLOW,

mapper.update:
update PDSCI.STUDY_COURSE

COURSE_NAME = #{record.courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where COURSE_FLOW = #{courseFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
